text: AeronautX Luftfahrtschule is a flight school located in Linz, Austria.AeronautX Luftfahrtschule GmbH It has been created in 1998. It is well known for its partnership with the airline FlyNikki.Mit NIKI ins Cockpit The school is member of the International Association of Aviation Personnel Schools. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Aviation organizations Category:Linz Category:Organizations based in Austria
title: AeronautX Luftfahrtschule
